title: S12 Ep85: The Naked Ghost
itunes:title: The Naked Ghost
description:
Legendary paranormal investigator Harry Price took on one of the most interesting and challenging cases of his life when he investigated the ghostly visitations of a naked, dead girl, Rosalie. A haunting so powerful he could physically feel, see and hear her. A haunting with a mysterious twist. Researcher Paul Adams walks us through this incredible case and the shocking aftermath of The Enigma of Rosalie.

Paul Adams: http://www.pauladamsauthor.co.uk/
